root.name: Evil Dead: A Fistful of Boomstick
root.description: Overview Evil Dead: A Fistful of Boomstick removes itself from the survival horror gameplay seen in Evil Dead: Hail to the King, opting for a more action-oriented experience. Nonetheless, the switch wasn't enough to remove the game from criticism, failing to create any kind of appeal for anyone outside of Evil Dead's pre-established cult audience. As Ash Williams, players will traverse the town of Dearborn, Michigan in various incarnations (1695, 1863, Evil Dearborn) and leading thus to an epilogue. Bruce Campbell returns to the give life to the voice of everyone's favorite one-liner spewing, "Deadite"-smiting hero, Ash. Weapons Boomstick: An upgradeable starting weapon. Chainsaw: Can be upgraded with a diamond pickup. Dynamite Gatling Gun Hand CannonLauncherLeecher Molotov Cocktail Pistol Shovel SickleSpraypump: Can alternatively be used as a flamethrower. Sword
